testcase.name: Verify dynamic button click
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on the buttons page.............................................passed When user clicks on the 'Click Me' button...................................passed Then the message 'You have done a dynamic click' should be displayed........passed

testcase.name: User selects a term from a dropdown list and verifies the selection
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the elements page..........................................passed When user selects the 'Text Box' tab........................................passed Then the selected term should be 'Text Box' tab.............................passed
